message.subject: Storage 2/15/02
message.content:

M1.2. REDFIELD: 255 max. wdl.
M1.3. LYONS: 32 max. wdl. thru the weekend
M1.4. sWRENSHALL/GARNER: Both available for vaporizing up to 300.
[Inform: list of items and their maximum storage caabilities, presumably]
